Why do I get file corrupt message during Java installation?
Restart your browser after installing Java to enable the new version.

message: General troubleshooting tips for Android devices. Restart your device. It might sound simple, but sometimes that's all it takes to fix a bad connection. If restarting doesn't work, switch between Wi-Fi and mobile data: Open your Settings app and tap Network & internet or Connections. Depending on your device, these options may be different. Turn Wi-Fi off and mobile data on, and check if there's a difference. If not, turn mobile data off and Wi-Fi on and check again.
